app.name: Team FESTIVAL
app.connection_interrupted_message: The WebSocket connection has been interrupted. Click here to reconnect.
app.connection_failure_message: The WebSocket connection could not be established. Click here to try again.
app.generic_error_message: Page could not be loaded. Please try again later.

login.login_error_title: There was an error signing you in
login.login_error_message:
The server responded with the following message:

%{code} %{name}
%{message}
login.register_password_match_title: There was an error creating your Account
login.register_password_match_message: The passwords you've entered do not match.
login.register_success_message:
Your account has been successfully created.
You will now be redirected to the Dashboard.

packages.name: Packages
packages.delete_package_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete "%{name}"?
This action cannot be undone.

Associated Reviews will also be deleted.

package_creator.title: Create a Package
package_creator.create_package_disclaimer:
To create your Package, you first need to reserve a name and a bundle identifier.
With both of these associated to you, you can start submitting your Package.

unsaved_changes.title: Unsaved changes
unsaved_changes.body:
Do you want to save the changes you've made?
Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.

info.platform_description: Select the platform your Package will be available for.
info.architecture_description: Select the architecture your Package was built for.
info.section_description: Pick the category that best describes your Package
info.package_visibility_visible: This Package is visible and can be downloaded
info.package_visibility_hidden: Don't show this Package in the Store
info.version_visibility_visible: This Version is visible and can be downloaded
info.version_visibility_hidden: Don't show this Version in the Store

package_name_availability.available_body: The selected Package name is available for use.
package_name_availability.unavailable_body: The selected Package name is already in use. Please use a different Package name.

bundle_id_availability.available_body: The selected Bundle ID is available for use.
bundle_id_availability.unavailable_body: The selected Bundle ID is already in use. Please use a different Bundle ID.

media.delete_item_body:
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
This action cannot be undone.
media.screenshot_upload_error_message_multiple: You can't upload the same screenshot multiple times.

devices.delete_device_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete "%{name}"?
This action cannot be undone.

Associated Reviews will also be deleted.

reviews.delete_review_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete this review?
This action cannot be undone.

requests.creator: Creator
requests.delete_request_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete this request?
This action cannot be undone.
requests.delete_account_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete "${username}"?
This action cannot be undone.

role_application.reason_header: Tell us why you'd like to apply:
role_application.developer_notice: When applying as a Developer, you must include a public Git-based repository containing a package and its source code. Failing to include this information will get your application rejected.

role_downgrade.title: Downgrade Role
role_downgrade.reason_header: Tell us why you'd like to downgrade your role:
role_downgrade.developer_notice: If you are a developer and have published packages, those will remain available to download, but you'll not be able to manage them until you reapply as a Developer.

account_deletion.title: Delete Account
account_deletion.reason_header: Tell us why you'd like to delete your account:
account_deletion.disclaimer: If your account is deleted, all your Packages, Reviews, linked Devices etc. will also be deleted. Be advised that this action cannot be undone.

users.no_users: There are no users to be shown here.

profile.delete_avatar_confirm_body:
Are you sure you want to delete your avatar?
This action cannot be undone.

edit_account.title: Edit Account

password.title: Change Password
password.error_match: The passwords you've entered do not match.

edit_account.error_title: There was an error updating your profile
edit_account.profile_changed_success_message: Your profile has been updated successfully.

profile.sign_out_body:
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Unsaved changes will be lost.
